title: Vote Goat
description: A web application that provides users with information about when, where, and how to vote in their area. It provides access their representative's contact information.

title: TinyLearn
description: A microlearning application that serves a random page from Wikipedia and allows users to save and rate that page for later learning. This app was inspired by many wasted moments in quarantine.

title: Fear Setter
description: This is a fear setting application. It allows users to add and conquer fears of a day or month and get points for doing so. It also grants the ability to dive deep into a big fear; looking at consequences and worse case scenarios. Fear Setter saves progress along the path of conquering.

title: Fitness Monitor
description: This application allows a user to track their workouts in a week. The user can add exercises to previous workouts or start new ones. The statistics of previous workouts are portrayed on graphs.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A common budget tracking app that functions both online and offline. It granted me the opportunity to explore some client-side database capabilities while refining my scripting abilities.

title: Employee Directory
description: This application allows a user to keep track of their employees. The user can sort them by last name or search to narrow their results. It currently fetches some data from a random user API, but a user can easily implement their own list of employees in a JSON file.
